!Grand Master Pabris: To change profession means that you have attained a certain degree of ability and experience, and may be promoted to a higher-level profession. Elven Fighters like yourself can change profession to an *Elven Knight* or an *Elven Scout*. Which profession do you want to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30066/02.htm|Elven Knight] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30066/05.htm|Elven Scout]
